beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea

definition: (publishing) layout and graphics/graphic design/art editor/graphic designer

sentences.english: The painter bequeathed his collection of art treasures to a museum.
sentences.chinese: 这位画家把他收藏的美术珍品遗赠给一个博物馆。

sentences.english: Looking at the artistic creations of Pan Li-hong gave rise to a series of thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 看了潘丽红的美术创作，引发一连串的思考。

sentences.english: He thought I was signing up for a drawing class in order to see nude girls.
sentences.chinese: 他以为我为了去看裸体姑娘而报名了一个美术课。

sentences.english: Artists who try to keep his uniform degree of light and shade in painting.
sentences.chinese: 那位美术家尽力保持他绘画中明暗度的均匀。

sentences.english: Since childhood love of art, hard-working people, self-taught.
sentences.chinese: 自幼热爱美术，勤奋过人，自学成材。

sentences.english: He received the master degree of China Art Academy.
sentences.chinese: 中国艺术研究院美术学硕士研究生。

sentences.english: Ms. Zhou Yali, Assistant Manager, Wuhan Arts and Crafts Industry Company.
sentences.chinese: 周雅丽女士，武汉工艺美术工业公司助理经理。

sentences.english: Is the artist at the national level, enjoy State Council special benefit.
sentences.chinese: 系国家一级美术师，享受国务院特殊津贴。

sentences.english: 1970 b . f . a applied arts seoul national university.
sentences.chinese: 1970年汉城国立大学，实用艺术，美术学士。

sentences.english: Shanghai Painting Art Academy uses nude model in its classes.
sentences.chinese: 上海图画美术院在教学中使用人体模特儿。

sentences.english: Hero's classes will be held at the Ruskin School of Drawing and Fine Art.
sentences.chinese: 赫罗的上课地点将在拉斯金绘画和美术学院。

sentences.english: Luxun had deep love for artistic works all his life, especially in woodcut of block print.
sentences.chinese: 鲁迅先生一生热爱美术作品，对版画中木刻兴趣尤甚。

sentences.english: 'Talks on Painting at Pisiju Residence', a discourse on his painting experience, was published by Shanghai People's Fine Arts Publishing House.
sentences.chinese: 谈艺录《癖斯居画谭》由上海人民美术出版社出版。

sentences.english: bernard's art class took a trip to the country to learn how to paint landscapes.
sentences.chinese: 伯纳德到乡下去上美术课，学习如何画风景画。

sentences.english: Can you describe the gallery you've been to in detail?
sentences.chinese: 能跟我们详细描述下你去过的美术馆吗？
